Line 70: Line 70:
==Appearances in media==
==Appearances in media==
===Books===
===Books===
â
[[Image:The Mark of Zorro.jpg|right|thumb|1959 book]]
  â  
* [[Johnston McCulley]]'s original magazine serial, "[[The Curse of Capistrano]]" from ''[[Argosy (magazine)#All-Story Magazine|All-Story Weekly]]'', was published in 1924 as a novella by [[Grosset & Dunlap]] under the title ''The Mark of Zorro''. It was reprinted by MacDonald & Co. in 1959 and by Tor books in 1998, ISBN 978-0-8125-4007-9.
* [[Johnston McCulley]]'s original magazine serial, "[[The Curse of Capistrano]]" from ''[[Argosy (magazine)#All-Story Magazine|All-Story Weekly]]'', was published in 1924 as a novella by [[Grosset & Dunlap]] under the title ''The Mark of Zorro''. It was reprinted by MacDonald & Co. in 1959 and by Tor books in 1998, ISBN 978-0-8125-4007-9.
* Johnston McCulley's Zorro short stories were reprinted by [[Pulp Adventures Inc.]] in a series of trade paperback editions.
* Johnston McCulley's Zorro short stories were reprinted by [[Pulp Adventures Inc.]] in a series of trade paperback editions.
